title: Woman Farmer

nouns: Person who grows then harvests food
A farm steward.
A person who operates a farm
A person who works the land or who keeps livestock, especially on a farm.
Person that undertakes agriculture
A farmer is a person engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials.
Person who works the land or who keeps livestock.
A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
Person who operates a ranch.
A person who owns or operates a ranch.
A person who owns or operates a ranch
The art or science of cultivating gardens; gardening.
The process or action of cultivating the soil, particularly in a garden; the care of a garden; horticulture.
The care of a garden.
The cultivation of plants
The act of cultivating or tending a garden.
The art and science of growing plants.
Horticulture is the branch of agriculture that deals with the art, science, technology, and business of plant cultivation.
Gardening is the practice of growing and cultivating plants as part of horticulture.

description: A woman engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials. Generally depicted as wearing a wide-brimmed hat and holding a crop (such as carrots or corn) or a pitchfork.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman farmer emoji stands with quiet confidence, her practical attire and the subtle earthy tones of her skin reflecting a connection to the land. Apple's rendering emphasizes a friendly, approachable demeanor with soft, rounded features and realistic lighting that highlights her determined yet gentle expression. Clad in sturdy clothing, perhaps with a hint of soil on her hands, she symbolizes hard work, growth, nurturing, and the vital role of agriculture, offering a grounded and positive message on Apple devices.
